content:
Hey folks, I've finally gotten to writing up a draft PR demonstrating OCI registry content storage and would love to get some feedback. If you get some time, please give it a look: https://github.com/bytecodealliance/registry/pull/146.

Abstract content storage via trait and introduce OCI content storage by devigned 路 Pull Request #146 路 bytecodealliance/registry
This PR introduces the concept of a "ContentStore", which is an abstraction for storing package content. There are currently 2 implementations for a content store, local and OCI. However, it would ...
Proposing a "v0" release scope if anyone wants to pre-read / pre-complain: https://hackmd.io/9FXZK5TxSwSU-5mHNbFGBQ#Jul-5---SIG-Registries-meeting
